scenario.init: Measuring probe axis (MPA) is at initial position (IP = true, m2IP = true, WP = false, m2WP = false)
scenario.action: The control system commands a move to the working position (m2WP = true -> m2IP = false)
scenario.expected_result: IP switches to false as the MPA leaves the initial position, and WP becomes true within a few seconds (MPA reaches and is recognized at working position)
scenario.instead_failure: IP remains true - no movement has occurred / the axis is stuck

diagnoses.name: MPA is stuck -> does not move besides being commanded to.
diagnoses.comment: MPA is stuck in initial position / move to working  position command is not recognized.
